Operation 'post-notifyShopper' has semantic quality issues: missing_context, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary uses indirect language ('Ask issuer'). Description lacks clarity about required inputs (shopper reference, payment details) and what the operation returns. Added specificity about the operation's scope (India-specific), required inputs, and expected output for better AI agent understanding. Improved terminology consistency with the API's recurring payment context.

data.current_summary: Ask issuer to notify the shopper
data.current_description: Sends a request to the issuer so they can inform the shopper about the upcoming recurring payment. This endpoint is used only for local acquiring in India. For more information, refer to [Recurring card payments in India](https://docs.adyen.com/payment-methods/cards/cards-recurring-india).
data.summary_suggestion: Notify shopper of upcoming recurring payment
data.description_suggestion: Sends a notification request to the card issuer to inform the shopper about an upcoming recurring payment. This operation is used exclusively for local card acquiring in India and requires the shopper reference and payment details. The issuer will contact the shopper directly. Returns confirmation of the notification request submission.
data.reasoning: Original summary uses indirect language ('Ask issuer'). Description lacks clarity about required inputs (shopper reference, payment details) and what the operation returns. Added specificity about the operation's scope (India-specific), required inputs, and expected output for better AI agent understanding. Improved terminology consistency with the API's recurring payment context.

message: Operation 'post-scheduleAccountUpdater' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary is adequate but description focuses only on input requirements without explaining the operation's purpose, effect, or output. Added clarity about what Account Updater does (refreshes stored payment details), the two input paths with their requirements, and what the operation returns. Improved AI agent interpretability by explaining the side effect (payment details will be updated by the issuer) and expected response.

data.current_description:
When making the API call, you can submit either the credit card information, or the recurring detail reference and the shopper reference:
 * If the card information is provided, all the sub-fields for `card` are mandatory.
 * If the recurring detail reference is provided, the fields for `shopperReference` and `selectedRecurringDetailReference` are mandatory.
data.description_suggestion: Schedules the Account Updater service to refresh stored payment details. Accepts either direct card information or a reference to an existing stored payment method via recurring detail reference and shopper reference. If providing card information, all card sub-fields are required. If using a stored payment reference, shopperReference and selectedRecurringDetailReference are required. Returns confirmation of the Account Updater scheduling request and any validation results.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate but description focuses only on input requirements without explaining the operation's purpose, effect, or output. Added clarity about what Account Updater does (refreshes stored payment details), the two input paths with their requirements, and what the operation returns. Improved AI agent interpretability by explaining the side effect (payment details will be updated by the issuer) and expected response.
